article: decrying what they perceive as a western campaign to unfairly link their religion to terrorism , islamic nations are calling for stronger international efforts to resolve new and old frustrations _ such as the u.s. occupation of iraq and the palestinian struggle _ which have fueled extremism and violence .
abstract: moderation not militancy _ muslim nations try to rid their religion of terrorist tag
